DOC.detailed_description: Moxibustion test version breech position singleton pregnancy . The woman randomize week 32 either moxibustion acupuncture point Bl 67 daily 15-20 minute moxibustion . In week 36-37 fetal position check external cephalic version offer still breech position . The randomization stratify primigravida multiparae separately . The randomization make random number even odd number indicate moxibustion . Sample size calculation give 45 woman group , base alfa 0.05 beta 20 condition 30 % effect moxibustion vs. 20 % spontaneous version control group primiparae 60 % multiparae , respectively . Thus , 4 time 45 woman group seek . Only woman perform three treatment judge principle intention treat . Exclusion criterion inclusion week 32 bleeding 2nd 3rd trimester , placenta insufficiency , cervical shortening , premature rupture membrane , preeclampsia , elevate blood pressure , pelvic insufficiency , low placental position , uterine malformation , former uterine corrective surgery know fetal morbidity
